original_text: And ye shall let nothing of it remain until the morning; and that which remaineth of it until the morning ye shall burn with fire.
korean_text: 아침까지 남겨두지 말며 아침까지 남은 것은 곧 불사르라

sentences.original_text: And ye shall let nothing of it remain
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그것 중 아무것도 남겨두지 말라

sentences.original_text: and that which remaineth of it
